description: A devout Catholic, Kasumi Karen was abused by her fundamentalist mother when her ability to manipulate fire manifested in her childhood, believing her powers to be demonic. As an adult she works as a call girl in a soapland brothel. Aoki visits her for a work interview, and the fact that he refuses to take advantage of her makes her admire him, which gradually develops into romantic attraction, but she never tells Aoki this out of respect for him and his family. She is one of the Dragons of Heaven.
name: Kasumi Karen
